  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DeadwheelKinematics
    Helper class that converts a deadwheel velocity (dx and dtheta components) to left and right wheel velocities for a differential drive.
    DeadwheelOdometry
    Class for deadwheel odometry.
    DeadwheelWheelPositions
    Represents the wheel positions for a differential drive drivetrain.

    Represents the wheel speeds for deadwheels.
